FuncDef: The display fwm eth-trunk local-id command displays Eth-Trunk ID information in the forwarding and control planes. The display fwm eth-trunk local-id command displays Eth-Trunk ID information in the forwarding and control planes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an Eth-Trunk.
The value is an integer in the range from 0 to 1023.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
